explanation: [0-0] A man stands in front of green plants, wearing a red T-shirt and blue shorts, gesturing, smiling, and looking forward. There are black subtitles in the middle that read "Spider Man Vampire Transformation".

[0-2] The man in red shoots spider silk from his right hand, trapping a green-skinned man in blue clothes against a metal wall. The trapped man opens his mouth wide in anger. Then, the man in red shoots spider silk from his left hand, trapping a yellow-haired man against the wall, who opens his mouth in surprise.

[0-2] The man in red shoots spider silk from his right hand, trapping a green-skinned man in blue clothes against a metal wall. The trapped man opens his mouth wide in anger. Then, the man in red shoots spider silk from his left hand, trapping a yellow-haired man against the wall, who opens his mouth in surprise.

[2-7] The man in red continues talking and gives a thumbs-up with his right hand. A red box with the white subtitles "SUBSCRIBE" appears below, with a small white hand underneath. Then, the subtitles and the small hand disappear. The man in red gestures, and the trapped green-skinned man opens his mouth wide, his eyes glowing green. The yellow-haired man also speaks.

[7-13] The man in red then puts both hands on his head, his eyeballs turning orange, and opens his mouth wide. The green-skinned man speaks, and the yellow-haired man also speaks. Then, the man in red extends his right hand, and a puff of black smoke emerges. His face turns gray, his mouth opens wide to reveal vampire fangs, and his eyes turn red, looking terrifying.
